decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Design Statement 02, 391-BSC-SITE-001 04, 391-BSC-SITE-100 04, 391-BSC-ELE-400 04, 391-BSC-ELE-401 03, 391-BSC-L00-200 05, 391-BSC-L01-201 05. Received 17/05/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
description: Reserved matters pertaining to access, appearance, landscaping, layout and scale of planning permission 00558/A/P55  dated 02/04/15 for Section 73 application seeking a minor material amendment (reduced site boundary, reduction of B1 floor space, reallocation of parking, changing position of link road and changes to parameters of plots) to planning permission 00558/A/P51 which granted approval for an 'Outline application for the demolition of existing buildings and structures and the development for a media broadcasting and production Campus of up to 104,670sqm (GIA) (now reduced to 95,934m2) comprising office (Class BA1), studio production and research and development facilities (Class B1b) and warehouse/storage (Class B8); hard and soft landscaping; reconfigured and new vehicle and pedestrian accesses and works to the public highway; the provision of parking; and all necessary ancillary and enabling works, plant and equipment
